option.name: buildRESTfulLayer
option.description: build DAO layer as an executable jar file

option.name: copyRESTfulLayer
option.description: copy DAO layer executable jar file

option.name: securityRemoteUrl
option.description: security account with URL to copy DAO restful API

option.name: fileLocation
option.description: security account with URL to copy DAO restful API

option.name: passphrase
option.description: passphrase for key file, leave empty if none
